snp3.10:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
snp3.10:1.3_0: Atha kho kokāliko bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
snp3.10:1.4_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho kokāliko bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
snp3.10:1.5_0: “pāpicchā, bhante, sāriputtamoggallānā, pāpikānaṁ icchānaṁ vasaṁ gatā”ti.
snp3.10:2.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, bhagavā kokālikaṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca:
snp3.10:3.2_0: tatiyampi kho kokāliko bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
snp3.10:3.4_0: Tatiyampi kho bhagavā kokālikaṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavoca:
snp3.10:4.1_0: Atha kho kokāliko bhikkhu uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
snp3.10:4.2_0: Acirappakkantassa ca kokālikassa bhikkhuno sāsapamattīhi piḷakāhi sabbo kāyo phuṭo ahosi;
snp3.10:4.12_0: Atha kho kokāliko bhikkhu tenevābādhena kālamakāsi.
snp3.10:4.13_0: Kālaṅkato ca kokāliko bhikkhu padumaṁ nirayaṁ upapajji sāriputtamoggallānesu cittaṁ āghātetvā.
snp3.10:5.1_0: Atha kho brahmā sahampati abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṁ jetavanaṁ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
snp3.10:5.2_0: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho brahmā sahampati bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
snp3.10:5.4_1: kokāliko bhikkhu padumaṁ nirayaṁ upapanno sāriputtamoggallānesu cittaṁ āghātetvā”ti.
snp3.10:5.6_0: idaṁ vatvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
snp3.10:6.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena bhikkhū āmantesi:
snp3.10:6.2_0: “imaṁ, bhikkhave, rattiṁ brahmā sahampati abhikkantāya rattiyā …pe…
snp3.10:6.3_0: idamavoca, bhikkhave, brahmā sahampati, idaṁ vatvā maṁ padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyī”ti.
snp3.10:7.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
snp3.10:7.2_0: “kīvadīghaṁ nu kho, bhante, padume niraye āyuppamāṇan”ti?
snp3.10:7.4_0: taṁ na sukaraṁ saṅkhātuṁ ettakāni vassāni iti vā ettakāni vassasatāni iti vā ettakāni vassasahassāni iti vā ettakāni vassasatasahassāni iti vā”ti.
snp3.10:8.2_0: tato puriso vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena ekamekaṁ tilaṁ uddhareyya.
snp3.10:8.3_0: Khippataraṁ kho so bhikkhu vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho iminā upakkamena parikkhayaṁ pariyādānaṁ gaccheyya,
snp3.10:8.4_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati abbudā nirayā evameko nirabbudo nirayo.
snp3.10:8.5_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati nirabbudā nirayā evameko ababo nirayo.
snp3.10:8.6_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati ababā nirayā evameko aṭaṭo nirayo.
snp3.10:8.7_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati aṭaṭā nirayā evameko ahaho nirayo.
snp3.10:8.8_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati ahahā nirayā evameko kumudo nirayo.
snp3.10:8.9_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati kumudā nirayā evameko sogandhiko nirayo.
snp3.10:8.10_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati sogandhikā nirayā evameko uppalako nirayo.
snp3.10:8.11_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati uppalakā nirayā evameko puṇḍarīko nirayo.
snp3.10:8.12_0: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati puṇḍarīkā nirayā evameko padumo nirayo.
snp3.10:8.13_0: Padumaṁ kho pana bhikkhu nirayaṁ kokāliko bhikkhu upapanno sāriputtamoggallānesu cittaṁ āghātetvā”ti.
snp3.10:8.15_0: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato athāparaṁ etadavoca satthā:
